_88status.description: The current disposition of an assessment

_88userInteractionUri.description: when present, a uri, with all query parameters urlencoded, of a small, iframe-able web page that the user (e.g. the recruiter) uses to interact with/view the assessment

_88userInteractionMessage.description: when present, a markdown formatted string that will be displayed to the user in the assessent popup. Any links open inside a new tab/window.

___userAttentionRequired.description: Signals that the assessment cannot proceed until the user provides some input. Can only be true when either userInteractionUri or userInteractionUri are non-null.

$eref.description: when present, a uri, with all query parameters urlencoded, of a small, iframe-able web page that the user (e.g. the recruiter) uses to interact with/view the assessment
when present, a markdown formatted string that will be displayed to the user in the assessent popup. Any links open inside a new tab/window.

___candidateInteractionUri.description: when present, a uri, with all query parameters urlencoded, that the candidate must follow to complete some part of the assessment

_88imageUrl.description: url of an image that will be loaded from an  app into the assessment hub to represent an assessment's status or an unstarted assessment type

_88raisers.description: a list of every user who raised this assessment (this may be more than one, i.e. via linkages). Does not include linkages raised by the system, e.g. an assessment started because a candidate dropped into a bucket

$eref.description: a list of every user who raised this assessment (this may be more than one, i.e. via linkages). Does not include linkages raised by the system, e.g. an assessment started because a candidate dropped into a bucket
The current disposition of an assessment
the assessment app's unique (within that app) and immutable key for this assessment type
url of an image that will be loaded from an  app into the assessment hub to represent an assessment's status or an unstarted assessment type

___view.description: the key of the view instance that will give more details about the subject of this assessment (name, email address, job ID, etc.)

___userAttentionRequired.description: Signals that the assessment cannot proceed until the user provides some input. Can only be true when either userInteractionUri or userInteractionUri are non-null.

___candidateInteractionUri.description: when present, a uri, with all query parameters urlencoded, that the candidate must follow to complete some part of the assessment
